title: One giant leap
brief_description: This documentary traces the amazing story of the Apollo 11 mission that led, on July 21, 1969, to Neil Armstrong landing on the moon. The program covers the planning of the operation, construction, interviews with ground crew and astronauts, as well as placing the event within a wider historical and social context.
